comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
The 5/1/14 Bain/LOC photo [above] of the cottage in Union Square, New York City, was posted to Flickr on April 29, 2011. Here is another Bain photo of the scene, dated a day later, but posted to Flickr on November 12, 2010 :
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5169603438/]
[N.B.: The Bain News Agency's offices were located in a building on Union Square.]
